translation.Name: Kuwait Note #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Dear family, I hope this note finds you in good health and dignity-
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: because I am not. As I write this, the special forces are closing in
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_4: on my abode, as I cower in the sewers below.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_5: I thought I could get away with laundering unspeakable amounts through the bank I have built up,
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_6: but that is not the case. In my final moments, I leave you, my 83 sons
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_7: and 2 daughters, the business of Big Man's Baller Bank. God speed.
